name: Webcharts
description: A library for creating flexible, interactive charts

scripts.build: npm run common && npm run amd && npm run es5 && npm run es6
scripts.es5: rollup src/index.js -g d3 | babel --modules ignore | cat build/open.js - build/close.js > build/webcharts.js
scripts.amd: rollup src/index.js -f amd -g d3 | babel > build/webcharts.amd.js

author: Rho, Inc.
